title: German Catholic Priests Defy Pope Francis With Public Blessings of Gay Couples
content:
1. German Catholic Priests Defy Pope Francis With Public Blessings of Gay Couples  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Cardinal Ruini Sees ‘Risk of Schism’ in Germany After Vatican ‘No’ to Same-Sex Blessings  National Catholic Register
  3. Pope Francis Ends Legal Privileges for Catholic Leaders Charged with Crimes  Friendly Atheist - Patheos
  4. Italian Cardinal on Blessings for Gay Unions: ‘God Cannot Bless Sin’  Breitbart
